casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rontel Vincae ROYSTER 441A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 19, 2019

Geeta Kapur, Attorney at Law, For Royster, Rontel Vincae.

Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of March 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of March 2019."
